name: Informal probate; unavailable in certain cases
text: §560:3-304  Informal probate; unavailable in certain cases.  Applications for informal probate which relate to one or more of a known series of testamentary instruments (other than a will and one or more codicils thereto), the latest of which does not expressly revoke the earlier, shall be declined. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
